text: Shlomo Aronson (1936 - 21 February 2020) was an Israeli historian and political scientist. He was a professor of political science at Hebrew University of Jerusalem. His best known work was the 2004 book, Hitler, the Allies, and the Jews. Aronson died on 21 February 2020 in Kfar Saba, aged 83. ==Works== * ==References== Category:1936 births Category:2020 deaths Category:Hebrew University of Jerusalem alumni Category:Hebrew University of Jerusalem faculty Category:Israeli historians Category:Israeli political scientists
title: Shlomo Aronson (historian)
